results.name: Least k>1 such that (2n-1)^k + 2 is prime, or 0 if no such number exists.
xref: Cf. A084713 = Smallest prime of the form (2n-1)^k + 2, or 0 if no such number exists. Cf. A138066 = Least k>0 such that (2n-1)^k + 2 is prime, or 0 if no such number exists. Cf. A051783 = Numbers n such that 3^n + 2 is prime. Cf. A087885 = Numbers n such that 5^n + 2 is prime. Cf. A090649, A109076, A113480, A138048, A138049, A138050, A138051, A087886, A113481.
results.author: _Alexander Adamchuk_, Mar 02 2008
